### Server Response Codes
### 1XX - Informational (100 etc.)
### 2XX - Success (200, 201, 204 etc.)
### 3XX - Redirection (302 etc.)
### 4XX - Client Error (404, 401, 403 etc.)
### 5XX - Server Error (503 etc.)
